TopicTitle: A bit of help balancing this craft?(MODS)

it also includes the custom TV aero-space wings that I made for personal use, they are 36m x 24m and provide ~55.# lift, 350 liquid fuel, and some electricity.

In pic 4+4+4=12 there is a strut on the right, but not the left, is that an artifact of the image, or actually missing?
It is there, look more closely, the screen shot was taken from an odd angle...
That real long one? Even at full res I can't see it on there, but I can see the mate to all the rest np.

Huh...just looked, and I see what you are saying.

I'll adress that and get back to ya.
